question: Bhawna Jat, who was seen in news recently, is associated with which athletic sports?
explanation:
Bhawana Jat is a top-rated female race walker of India. She was seen in news recently as she was qualified for the Tokyo Olympics Games in 20km Race-Walk event.
The 24-year-old Race walker from Rajasthan was declared as qualified, after she set a new national record at the seventh National Race Walk Championships, held in Ranchi. The Olympic qualification mark was 1:31.00, while she completed the race in 1 hour, 29 minutes and 54 seconds.
